text: Thomas Arthur Van Arsdale (born February 22, 1943) is an American former professional basketball player. He was born in Indianapolis, Indiana. He had an identical twin brother, Dick Van Arsdale, who was also a basketball player. Van Arsdale played for the National Basketball Association from 1965 to 1977. Van Arsdale played for the Detroit Pistons, Cincinnati Royals / Kansas City- Omaha Kings, Philadelphia 76ers, Atlanta Hawks and the Phoenix Suns. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Twin people from the United States Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Phoenix Suns players Category:Sportspeople from Indianapolis
title: Tom Van Arsdale
